rows.label: tlk45100152_03_msg0001
rows.name:
I found a Cubic Diamond in a storage
warehouse at the old factory.

rows.label: tlk45100152_03_msg0002
rows.name:
I gave it to my mom as a present,
but she slapped me... Said I shouldn't
be going to such dangerous places.

rows.label: tlk45100152_03_msg0003
rows.name:
But then she smiled and said I was
a brave and kind boy! Worthy of
Emperor Nefer himself, she said!

rows.label: tlk45100152_03_msg0004
rows.name:
So I've decided. Next, I'm gonna
go to the Old City of Teddim and
find an Amber Leaf!
